SEARCH
Package jchess

Class Moves

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
jchess.Moves
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
public class Moves extends AbstractTableModel
Class representing the players moves, it's also checking that the moves taken by player are correct. All moves which was taken by current player are saving as List of Strings The history of moves is printing in a table
See Also:
